doc.summary: Normally ModInit will infer the mod id and mod class from your <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/fml/common/Mod">@Mod</ref>  annotation.
doc.text:
Normally ModInit will infer the mod id and mod class from your @Mod annotation. However, if you have multiple mods in the same project, you need to put
@ForMod on classes or packages to tell ModInit to which mod a class or package belongs. Any annotation closer to the element subject to code generation
will suppress all annotations further away.
